#summary Wire3D in action.
#labels Featured

The demo application ([http://code.google.com/p/wire3d/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2FSamples%2FDemo%2Fsrc Source]) loads a scene using an Importer class and attaches a few controllers manipulating the scene, so that it is not completely static. If you are familiar with the rest of the [http://code.google.com/p/wire3d/wiki/Samples samples], it should be fairly easy to understand.
